title: Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are amended
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are amended
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are amended 
by substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as amended by 
the European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining Agriculture 
Plant Species) (Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 518 of 2023) the 
following- 
“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/90/EC of 6 October 20032 
as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2024/2963 of 29th 
November 2024;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 122 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2023 (s.i no 518 2023) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 90 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2024 2963 29th november 2024

title: Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are amended
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 518 of 
2023) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 April, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. EN Series, 02.12.2024, p.17 
2 O.J. No. L 254, 08.10.2003, p.7 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [137] 3

title: Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are amended
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2024/2963 of 29 November 2024 which amends Council 
Directive 2003/90/EC which provides for CPVO and UPOV updated protocols, 
in particular as regards potato, safflower, cauliflower, sprouting broccoli, 
Brussels sprouts, kohlrabi, savoy cabbage, white cabbage, red cabbage, 
watermelon, lettuce, radish, corn salad and tomato rootstocks. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [137]
